socalsupermoto Blog » electric http://socalsupermoto.com/blog General ramblings of socal supermoto Tue, 02 Sep 2014 22:19:16 +0000 http://wordpress.org/?v=2.8.4 en hourly 1 KTM Electric Supermoto http://socalsupermoto.com/blog/2010/03/28/ktm-electric-supermoto/ http://socalsupermoto.com/blog/2010/03/28/ktm-electric-supermoto/#comments Sun, 28 Mar 2010 22:32:09 +0000 Administrator http://socalsupermoto.com/blog/?p=154 90 min charge time, 60 min ride time, under 200lbs, 30hp, around $7,000. Might not be all that much to get excited about until you give it some thought. With a switch limiting the speed to 25mph this bike is legal to ride on all mountain biking trails. Or better yet, have yourself a big parking lot supermoto race without ANYBODY EVEN KNOWING ABOUT IT! This bike is the urban hooligan’s dream machine, from flying around on joggers trails to dragging knee around your local church.
